name: Candy Sweet Splash! Bubble Pop-Smash Puzzle Game
name_original: Candy Sweet Splash! Bubble Pop-Smash Puzzle Game
description:
There is no time to waste! Let the sweet blasting begin!

A definite fun and highly addictive game.

Hungry for sweets?
This game will not give you a toothache but instead of eating it you can crush the sweets.

A classic matching game with a twist of sweetness!
Simply match three or more sweets to get a blast!
Reach the target score to move to next level.
The more number of group of sweets the higher the score.

The best candy game you will surely love! Download now!

Game Features:

>Easy play
>Enhance your strategic skills
>Fun and exciting
